titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Pauls March 27. 1640 Being the anniversary of his Majesties happy inauguration to his crowne. By Henry King, Deane of Rochester, and residentiary of St. Pauls: one of his Maiesties chaplaines in ordinary
titleStmt.author: King, Henry, 1592-1669.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [A]² B-H⁴ I² .
Running title reads: I haue this day set thee ouer nations and kingdomes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
